reviewText: The picture quality of this DVD is absolutely horrible!  It looks like you're watching an old projector movie in elementary school that is very blurry and the picture is flickering the entire time.  Also, I did not know that this was a made-for-TV type of production; I thought it would be more of a documentary, but I was wrong....my bad.  I don't recommend this to anyone solely because of the lack of quality.

I have not watched the movie yet so I can't give you an opinion but it does come highly recommended if you're a Macdonald - however if you're a Campbell I would not recommend you watch it because you could become quite unhappy with your Scottish ancestors!
